synopsis.text: Cover Corp presents a captivating teaser music video for "Shiny Smily Story," the debut song of the hololive IDOL PROJECT. This lively tune showcases the impressive vocal talents of Hololive Production's diverse roster of vTubers. Originally premiered at Comiket 96, the teaser offered a tantalizing glimpse into the full version of the song, which was later released on September 16, 2019, as part of Hololive Summer '19.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
